block.p: Aisha Shani Christian, the daughter of Fay Fryer Christian of New York and Dr. Michael O. Christian of Gates Mills, Ohio, was married last evening to Frederick Everette Royall III, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Royall Jr. of Silver Spring, Md. Judge Barrington D. Parker Jr. of Federal District Court in White Plains officiated at the Burden Mansion in New York.

Mrs. Christian Royall, 26, is an associate at Davis Polk & Wardwell, the New York law firm. She graduated cum laude from Wellesley College and Harvard Law School. Her father is a radiologist at Hillcrest Hospital in Mayfield Heights, Ohio. Her mother is a reading specialist at Public School 217 in New York.

Aisha Shani Christian, the daughter of Fay Fryer Christian of New York and Dr. Michael O. Christian of Gates Mills, Ohio, was married last evening to Frederick Everette Royall III, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Royall Jr. of Silver Spring, Md. Judge Barrington D. Parker Jr. of Federal District Court in White Plains officiated at the Burden Mansion in New York.

Mrs. Christian Royall, 26, is an associate at Davis Polk & Wardwell, the New York law firm. She graduated cum laude from Wellesley College and Harvard Law School. Her father is a radiologist at Hillcrest Hospital in Mayfield Heights, Ohio. Her mother is a reading specialist at Public School 217 in New York.

Mr. Royall, 30, is an associate in the equity capital markets group at Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette, the New York investment bank. He graduated from Syracuse University and received an M.B.A. degree from Columbia. His mother, Gracie Royall, is a revenue specialist at General Electric Global Exchange Services in Gaithersburg, Md. His father is a travel consultant at American Express Corporate Services in Gaithersburg.
